item.description:
Zest used to be Monet's table and My Birthday is the 19th so you know this month is all about "me".

Join us for a truly unique dining experience. Enjoy our ethnically influenced American Cuisine combined with a beautiful setting. The multifarious menu at Zest offers brunch, lunch and dinner entrees made completely from scratch on the premises, including our own home-baked bread. We support our local farms by choosing artisan cheeses, hormone free dairy products and meat whenever possible.

Dine inside our picturesque 1750â€™s farmhouse surrounded by gorgeous gardens or enjoy our outdoor patio seating. Our rustic and charming establishment also offers privately catered weddings, showers, rehearsal dinners and more.



Lets do brunch On a Hopefully sunny morning

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Sandy's Birthday Brunch at ZEST
